title: I\'m renting a property in Garden Grove area. Address is 11952 Janette Lane, Garden Grove, CA 92840. I would like to how\'s the area crime vise. Is it safe area to live or not. Please advise ASAP.
text:
We
are based in coastal North Carolina and can only answer questions in
our readership area. We suggest contacting your local police
